blocks.text: Bod√∏/Glimt host Inter Milan ‚Äî Norway's biggest club night ever

The Norwegian champions step into the Champions League Round of 16 for the first time. Inter arrive bruised ‚Äî Galatasaray put five past Juventus last night, setting the tone for a ferocious week in Europe.
